synthesis_conditions.washing_method: DMF washing and decanting (5 × 15 mL), then soaking in DMF (2 × 100 mL) at 50 ºC for 2 days
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: FT-IR and elemental analysis data provided.

synthesis_conditions.activation_method: Soaking in THF (12 × 20 mL) for 4 days and then heating for 36 hours at 120 ºC under reduced pressure
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: FT-IR and elemental analysis data provided.

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Soaking in DMF (2 × 20 mL) at 50 ºC for 2 days
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: FT-IR and elemental analysis data provided.
